verses.roman:
rāmadāsa mahādeve karila daraśana
ahovala-nṛsiṁhere karilā gamana

synonyms: rāma-dāsa—Rāmadāsa; mahā-deve—of Mahādeva; karila—did; daraśana—seeing; ahovala-nṛsiṁhere—to Ahovala-nṛsiṁha; karilā—did; gamana—going.
translation: There he saw Lord Mahādeva [Śiva], the servant of Lord Rāma. He then went to Ahovala-nṛsiṁha.
